h: Del woman, grandson killed in Road accident
3 killed in two separate road mishaps in Kharar
Two bikers killed in accidents in Mohali
Four killed, 14 injured in Road accident in Haryana's Panipat
sub_h: The deceased have been identified as Kanta and Munni of Kamach Khera village, Mohit of Madanpur village in Hisar and Ashwini of Lajwana village in Jind.

h: Ex-rly official among two killed in Road accidents
45-yr-old killed in Road accident
Lok Adalat settles ₹3 crore claim in Road accident case
Pregnant woman killed in Road accident in Mohali
sub_h: A pregnant woman died when a car she was travelling in collided with a stationary truck on the Kharar-Landran highway in Mohali on Wednesday.

h: Auto driver booked after Road accident
Not justified to hold driver guilty of offence involving moral turpitude in accidents: Punjab and Haryana high court
sub_h: The Punjab and Haryana high court has made it clear that in the case of Road accidents, it would not be justified to hold that the driver is guilty of an offence involving moral turpitude.

h: 5 killed in Road accidents
Man, son die in Road accident
4 killed in Road accident
sub_h: After a speeding SUV hit a group of bicyclists on a road in Punjab's Sangrur district late Thursday evening, four people died and three others were injured. The fourth victim was a resident of Thuhi village in Nabha district. Police officials say the body of one victim was found in the fields on Friday morning, while two others were declared dead by doctors at Sangrur Hospital on Thursday night. One victim was referred to an Institute in Patiala where he succumbed to injuries. Around 417,000 domestic consumers of the Patiala district alone got a relief of Rs. 19620 crore as they got zero electricity bills. Minister of Finance, Harpal Singh Cheema, directed the officials to resolve the grievances of the people on priority, besides completing all the ongoing projects in a time bound manner.

h: Former Tripura CM Biplab Deb escapes unhurt in car crash in Haryana's Panipat
sub_h: Former Tripura chief minister and BJP leader Biplab Kumar Deb on Monday escaped unhurt after his car rammed into a stationary vehicle on the GT road in Haryana's Panipat district, police said.

h: Road accidents claim 4,604 lives in Haryana in 2022
sub_h: As many as 10,083 accidents were reported and 4,604 people were killed in Road accidents in 2022 (till November) in the state, according to the data compiled by the Integrated Road accident Database (iRAD), an initiative of the ministry of road transport and highways.

h: 13 people lost their lives daily in Road accidents across Punjab in 2021
sub_h: On an average, 13 people lost their lives daily in Road accidents across Punjab in 2021 – an increase of 17.7% as compared to 2020. The state registered 5,871 Road accidents, in which 4,589 people lost their lives and 2,032 were seriously injured.

h: Haryana to initiate special drive to identify new accident-prone areas
sub_h: The Haryana traffic police is all set to have a fresh look into the accident-prone dark spots and to identify new dark spots to prevent Road accidents in the state.

h: Road accidents snuff out 3 lives
sub_h: A 21-year-old man was killed after an SUV collided with a car on Kharar-Landran road in the early hours of Monday, one of the three victims in Road accidents in the last 24 hours.The victim is Kunwar Raj Singh of Pathankot. He studied in a college in Chandigarh.

h: 5 die as Sirsa crash splits car into two
sub_h: A five-person car crash killed two infants and their mother and two other people on Monday. The car broke into two pieces and rolled over into a tree. The victims were identified as two-month-old baby Aarti and her mother Shabnam, and Parvati Saraswati and driver Vikram, all residents of Mehnakhera village in Sirsa. The accident occurred when the car's driver lost control of the car and it careened off the road at high speed and rammed into a tree. Fatal s are becoming common in Hisar, according to Haryana Deputy Chief Minister Dushyant Chautala.

h: 4 students die in Jal car accident
sub_h: Two students died in a car accident near Beas village on Sunday when their car jumped to the other side of the Jalandhar-Pathankot National Highway and hit a truck head-on. They were on the way from Pathankot to the College of Veterinary Sciences in Rampura Phul in Bathinda district. The car went out of control and jumped the median, rammed the truck at Alawalpur Police Post Officer in Charge Pritpal Singh said. "Two students died on the spot while two including a girl succumbed to their injuries in a hospital," he said. The car driver, Ajay Kumar, was injured and the victims included Shelija Guleria, Simran Singh, Lokesh, and Rohan, all from different areas of Pathankot.

h: 1 dies, 1 injured in Road accident
sub_h: One person died while his younger brother who was driving the scooter got badly injured after a tipper truck, which was coming from the opposite direction hit their vehicle near Pinjore garden on Saturday late at night. Police registered a case.

h: Average 13 people in Punjab lost lives daily in Road accidents in 2021
Road crash deaths to be cut by 50%: Min
sub_h: Punjab transport minister Laljit Singh Bhullar on Wednesday set a target of reducing mortality rate in Road accidents by 50%.

h: ‘Sarkar ki galti hai’: Diljit on singer’s killing
sub_h: Singer-actor Diljit Dosanjh, in a recent interview, has blamed the government and politics for the May 29 killing of fellow entertainer Sidhu Moose Wala.

h: Mohali: Three killed in separate Road accidents
sub_h: Two motorcycle riders lost their lives in separate Road accidents in the past 24 hours in Mohali. In the first incident of hit and run, a motorcycle rider, identified as Gurchand Singh (50), was killed after his motorcycle was hit by a speeding car.

h: On average, 22 people get killed every month in Mohali Road accidents
sub_h: On average, 22 lives are lost every month due to accidents on Mohali roads. In the last three years, 807 people lost their lives in various Road accidents reported in the Mohali area.

h: Couple, woman killed in Pkl Road accidents
sub_h: Three people were killed in two Road accidents in Panchkula in 24 hours. A couple identified as Tilak Raj Sharma (73) and Suchita Sahajpal (69), both residents of Pinjore, died after their scooty was allegedly hit by an oil tanker near Chandimandir toll plaza.

h: Teen killed in Road accident
sub_h: chandigarh a 15yearold girl died after an unknown vehicle hit her in nayagaon on tuesday night lavanya of nayagaon was walking back home when the accident took place around 330 pm said her family members who came to know about the accident later pgi staff told them that a woman got lavanya admitted to the hospital where she succumbed to its injuries the family members but the...

h: Road accidents: Punjab to engage social, academic institutions
sub_h: The Punjab government has decided to engage expert organisations, universities, colleges, NGOs and registered societies for assisting in efforts to save lives in Road accidents in the state.

h: Three of family killed in Road accident on Phagwara-Chandigarh NH
sub_h: CCTV footage of the accident clearly showed trailer coming from Banga on the other side of the road suddenly took a turn without even properly slowing down, when two cars going towards Banga rammed into it.

h: 2 injured in Road accidents
sub_h: Two persons, including a cyclist were injured after being hit by two different cars in Chandigarh. The first case was registered on the complaint of constable Rakesh Kumar, posted at Sector 3 police station.

h: Haryana: Cop beaten, uniform torn after Road accident in Ambala, case registered
Siblings hurt in Road accident
sub_h: A 17-year-old girl and her 15-year-old brother were injured after a car hit them near Samadhi Gate in Manimajra, sources said here on Tuesday.

h: Punjab: 3 members of family killed in Road accident in Tanda
sub_h: The incident happened when the car in which they were travelling rammed into a parapet of a culvert near Focal Point, Tanda, about 34 Kms from Hoshiarpur, they said. Those who died in the accident hailed from Jalandhar.

h: Five members of family killed in Road accident in Punjab's Kapurthala
sub_h: Five members of a family, all residents of Ludhiana, died in a Road accident on Jalandhar-Amritsar national highway near Hamira village here on Monday, police said.

h: Punjab: Mother-son duo among 3 killed in Road accidents
sub_h: A woman and her 4-year-old son were among three killed in two Road accidents in Mohali district.

h: Haryana: 3 killed, 15 injured as truck runs over sleeping migrants in Jhajjar
sub_h: At least three labourers were killed and fifteen others sustained injuries after a speeding truck ran over them on Kundli-Manesar-Palwal (KMP) expressway near Asoda toll plaza in Bahadurgarh in Haryana's Jhajjar district on Thursday morning.

h: 3 killed in Road accidents
6 of family killed, 17 others injured in Jind Road accident
sub_h: Six members of a family were killed and 17 others injured when the vehicle they were travelling in collided with a truck near Kandela village in Haryana’s Jind district road on Tuesday, reports Vijender Kumar.

h: Haryana: 5 of family killed in Road accident on Delhi-Jaipur Highway
sub_h: Five members of a family, including two women, were killed and 11 others were injured after their vehicle collided with a parked truck on the Delhi-Jaipur highway near Odhi village in Haryana's Rewari on Tuesday.

h: 10-12 deaths daily in Road accidents in state: DGP
sub_h: Punjab DGP V K Bhawra said on Monday that on an average daily, Punjab lost 11-12 lives in Road accidents, the majority of which could be prevented or reduced in severity by focusing on moving traffic violations.

h: 25-yr-old killed in Road accident
Haryana: Two women killed in Road accident
sub_h: Two women were killed in a Road accident while their scooty got imbalanced near Shahpur village on Kaithal road due to speed breaker and a speeding truck coming from back the side crushed them leaving death of both on the spot here in Jind district on Saturday.

h: Six killed in Road accident in Punjab's Mansa
sub_h: Six people including two children were killed after a car collided head-on with a private bus coming from an opposite direction on Mansa-Barnala road in Punjab on Wednesday, police said.

h: Punjabi actor Deep Sidhu, accused in Red Fort violence case, dies in Road accident
sub_h: Punjabi actor turned farmer activist Deep Sidhu died in a Road accident near Sonipat in Haryana, confirmed police. Deep Sidhu had also been involved in a Republic Day violence case in 2021.

h: Haryana: 2 killed, 3 injured in Road accidents in Karnal
sub_h: Two persons were killed and three others sustained injuries in two different Road accidents in Karnal.

h: Himachal Pradesh: 10 killed in Sirmaur Road accident
sub_h: Wedding festivities turned into mourning in Sirmaur district of Himachal Pradesh on Monday evening when 10 persons, part of a marriage procession, were killed and two injured in a Road accident. A vehicle carrying ‘barrat’ veered off the road and fell into a gorge at a place called Pashog on Timbi-Bakras link road under sub-division Shillai.

h: Punjab: 3 Congress workers killed in Road accident in Moga
sub_h: Three Congress workers from Zira in district Ferozepur died in a Road accident when the bus they were travelling in collided head on with State roadways bus near village Lohara in district Moga on Friday morning.

h: Punjabi singer Diljan killed in Road accident
Two Punjab farmers returning from Delhi protest killed in Road accident
sub_h: Two Punjab farmers who were returning to Patiala from a protest site near Delhi's borders were killed in an early morning accident on Tuesday after their tractor trolley was hit by a truck in Haryana's Karnal district, police said.

h: 2 injured in Road accident
Punjab: Protesters block national highway near Jalandhar after woman dies in Road accident
sub_h: The national highway near Jalandhar in Punjab was blocked on Monday after a woman was killed in a Road accident.

h: Chandigarh: After killing wife, man dies as his car hits truck
sub_h: Just a few hours after a man allegedly murdered his 32-year-old wife at their rented accommodation in Sunny Enclave, Kharar, he was killed in a Road accident in Chandigarh in the early hours of Friday.

h: 6 die in accidents, 8 others injured
sub_h: Six persons died and eight others sustained injuries in two Road accidents in Karnal and Yamunanagar on Wednesday.

h: Chandigarh: Death catches up with 55-year-old after he survives first Road accident
sub_h: A 55-year-old man was killed and four others injured after an auto-rickshaw overturned on road dividing sectors 19 and 20 in the early hours of Sunday.

h: Haryana sees decline in Road accidents, claims state police
sub_h: Haryana Police on Monday claimed that Road accidents have declined in the state this year as compared to the last year. Director general of police (DGP) Haryana, Manoj Yadava, said that Road accidents in the state have registered a fall of 20.44 per cent in the first nine months of 2020 as compared to the last year.

h: Man killed after speeding car runs into two-wheeler in Chandigarh
sub_h: A 43-year-old man lost his life after a speeding car rammed into his two-wheeler on the Airport road on Friday.

h: 72-year-old cyclist killed in Road accident
Haryana sees over 20% dip in Road accidents, fatalities: DGP
sub_h: Haryana witnessed less fatalities and Road accidents till September this year as compared to last year, director general of police (DGP) Manoj Yadava said on Monday.

h: Haryana: Two killed in truck-car collision in Yamunanagar
sub_h: Two men were killed in a head-on collision between a truck and car near Buria Chowk under the limits of Jagadhri City police station in Yamunanagar district on Saturday night.

h: Punjab: Judicial officer dies in Road accident
sub_h: A judicial magistrate first class (JMIC), Pathankot, Punjab was killed while another JMIC and his friend suffered injuries when their car crashed into a pole at dividing road of sector 16-23, around 2am on Friday.

h: Punjab: Khalsa Aid member dies in Road accident
Four men killed in Road accident in Punjab
42 Road accident deaths in Punjab even during 26 days of lockdown
sub_h: Punjab has recorded 42 Road accident fatalities during the 26 days of lockdown, when the movement of vehicles is bare minimum on the roads. This amounts to average 1.7 per day Road accidental death rate.

h: State launches ‘Safe Punjab Programme’ to cut down on Road accident deaths
Chandigarh: 26-year-old killed in hit-and-run
sub_h: A 26-year-old BA final-year student was killed in a hit-and-run case near transport light point, Sector 26 on Wednesday.An eyewitness reported that the victim's bike was hit by an unknown motorcycle driver.

h: Punjab: Measures to check Road accidents await jump-start
sub_h: Every day for the last eight years, an average of 13 lives are being cut short in Road accidents in Punjab, but the state government is yet to put its planned corrective measures into motion.

h: 6.7% drop in Road accident deaths in Haryana: Police
sub_h: Fatalities in Road accidents in Haryana dropped by 6.7% this year, from 1,791 between January and April 2018 to 1,671 in the same period this year, said a police official here on Monday.

h: Haryana police inspector dies in Road accident in Pehowa, case registered
Ambala: MS student dies in Road accident in Mullana
Khalsa Aid member on way to give PPEs dies in Road accident
sub_h: A member of international humanitarian relief charity organisation Khalsa Aid, Inderjit Singh, died in a Road accident near Bajakhana on Bathinda-Faridkot national highway on Monday night. His companion sustained injuries.

h: Three injured in separate Road accidents
Punjab ranks 2nd in severity of Road accidents
Plans made to prevent fatal accidents yet to see daylight
Supreme Court panel not impressed with Punjab’s efforts to curb Road accident fatalities
sub_h: The Supreme Court committee on road safety has expressed displeasure over Punjab government’s failure to curb the raising trend of fatalities due to Road accidents and set a target of bringing down the number by 10%. The observation made by the committee was discussed in a meeting of the Punjab state road safety council held on December 24. State transport minister Razia Sultana emphasised the need to speed up the road safety measures to reduce fatal accidents.

h: Chandigarh: 30 pedestrians, 10 cyclists killed in accidents this year
sub_h: Out of 92 people killed in Road accidents in the city from January 1 to December 16, as many as 30 were pedestrians and 10 were cyclists, according to the records of the UT police.

h: Chandigarh: Cyclist killed in Sector 20, 3 hurt in car crash near mall
sub_h: Accidents claimed the life of a 58-year-old cyclist and left three occupants of a car injured on Friday.

h: Zomato loses fourth boy to crash in seven months
sub_h: Zomato has lost its fourth food delivery boy to a Road accident in seven months. Sunny, 23, died in a hit-and-run on the dividing road of sectors 12-A and 14 in the wee hours of Thursday.

h: 2018 accidents: Casualties below 100 for 1st time in six years in Chandigarh
sub_h: The number of casualties in Road accidents in Chandigarh in 2018 has come down to 98, which is the lowest since 2013, the data released by the ministry of road transport and highway transport research wing, New Delhi, has revealed.
